content.text:
# 2006 St. George Illawarra Dragons season

|league=NRL|league_champions=|league_draws=0|league_losses=10|league_rank=6th|league_wins=14|list=|next_season=2007|playoff_result=Preliminary Finals|points_against=481|points_for=519|prev_season=2005|stadium=Jubilee Oval,
Wollongong Showground|top_goals=Aaron Gorrell (55)|top_points=Aaron Gorrell (130)|top_tries=Mark Gasnier (18)|year=2006}}The 2006 St. George Illawarra Dragons season was the eighth in the joint venture club's history. The Dragons competed in the NRL's 2006 premiership season. The team finished sixth in the regular season, making finals but getting knocked out in the preliminary finals against the Melbourne Storm, losing 24–10.
